body.p: If you're planning to attend FOSDEM (The Free and Open Source software developer's European Meeting being held in Brussels, Belgium on February 16-17 2002) then make a point to stop by and visit us! Portage Release Engineer Geert Bevin and Desktop Developer Bart Verwilst will be there representing the Gentoo Linux development team. We'll have an up-to-date Gentoo Linux mirror on-site, 50 CDRs burnt with the latest version of Gentoo Linux on them (including binaries), an 8-port hub where people can "plug in" and download/install Gentoo Linux to their heart's content, and a bunch of really groovy cow posters for you to look at. Geert and Bart will be there both days to answer your questions, chat about Gentoo Linux stuff and help you to get the most out of your Gentoo Linux system. :)
